stepAnswer: The coin is unfair and that the difference in the observed data is due to something other than just chance.
stepBody: What is an alternative model for Brandon’s coin? You do not necessarily have to be able to simulate under this model.
choices: A. Each flip is independent with probabilty of Heads $$=$$ $$0.5$$
The coin is unfair and that the difference in the observed data is due to something other than just chance.
